review_details: Sehr schöner Ort für eine Brotzeit. Sehr leckere österreiche Schmankerln und insbesondere ein toller Apfelstrudel. Sehr empfehlenswert!

Sehr empfehlenswertes Restaurant mit sehr leckerem und tollem Essen. Sehr nett und aufgeschlossener Chef, der mit Rat und Tat zur Seite steht, wie auch das nette Personal. Sehr leckere schwäbische Spezialitäten und immer einige saisonale Besonderheiten.

Gehe seit Jahren (un-) regelmäßig zum Frühstück zum Herbertz. Immer sehr schön, lecker, nette Leute und toller Kaffee. Tolle und lockere Atmosphäre. Leider komme ich nicht mehr häufig hin, aber wenn ich in der Nähe bin, immer gerne!!!

We had a very perfect evenning and enjoyed the excellent meal. As it was so good, we decided to visit this restaurant a second time. We had a perfect view over a very nice small part of the harbour and could cherish the sunset during eating. Really perfct!

reviewTitle: Perfect beach and very nice water.
review_details: Very nice beach area. Good place for resting a whole day. A very nice bar with good Cafe frape is locted right next to the beach.

reviewTitle: Beautiful and nice place to be.
review_details:
Very nice place with lots of tourist shops and nice places to rest for a drink.
Very nice old castle / monastery.

We had an amazing and perfect day with George. It was very beautiful experience and we made a nice trip along the coast. We were provided with an enormous sympathy and the hospitalty was really unique - Greeke salad, sweets and cookies were served. The boat trip brought us to two very nice bays where we really could enjoy swiming and watching fish. We cherrished the trip very much and will do it again!
The most perfect day during perfect holidays! Thanks, George!
